body.name: Calming Moisturizing Face Mask Sheet - Nature Republic Real Nature Aloe Extract Natural-Derived Cellulose Sheet Long Lasting Healing Troubled Dry Skin 10pcs x 23ml/0.77fl.oz
body.stockDetail: Only 14 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 3 hrs 34 mins
features: Nature Republic Real Nature Aloe Extract Mask Sheet contains 23mg of Aloe Vera Leaf extract with plenty of moisture, soothes skin irritation and make it smooth.

Aloe Vera Leaf extract contains antioxidants, Vitamins A and C, enzymes, which help treat troubles skin, sunburns and dry skin. Aloe has molecular structure which helps heal wounds quickly and minimize scarring. It also helps to eradicate skin blemishes and diminish age lines, increase the production of collagen and improve skin elasticity.

Upgraded Sheet Fabric! Adhesion Up! Transparency Up! Natural-derived cellulose sheet obtained from Eucalyptus wood and cotton adhere closely to the skin and transfer highly concentrated essence to the skin. Renewal sheet fabric with small holes in the sheet texture help to adhere better to the skin and moisturize skin for a long time.
Nature Republic Real Nature Aloe Mask Sheet is an ampoule type mask sheet with transparent moisturizing texture.

How to use: 1. After washing the face, apply toner to prepare the skin for the next step of skin care. 2. Open the pouch, pull out the mask, and replace on the face, using the eye area to align correctly. 3. Remove after 10-20 minutes and gently pat the remaining essence for better absorption.
body.description: Nature Republic Real Nature Mask 10 Sheets for Skin Hydration (Aloe)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holy Grail of sheet masks
reviews.reviewText: I have sworn by these for years after living in Korea!! My skin is super dry and I sometimes get red spots after a long and tiring day wearing makeup.If I throw one of these bad boys on after skincare my skin immediately clears up and thanks me.On top of the magical healing properties these masks smell amazing and feel soothing!I recommend leaving it in your fridge for extra soothing effects 💕Literally I only use nature republic masks because they just work amazing for my skin 💓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love & Highly Recommend!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a pack and tried the mask for the first time. My skin has been very dry lately and I have sensitive skin. I didn’t have any bad reactions to it and it was very soothing after wearing it my skin was noticeably more hydrated. I also noticed after the first and second time that some clogged pores came to the surface in a way that made it easy to extract without my face breaking out horribly too. So it seems to cleanse the skin as it is working as well. I put some in my fridge to add a cooling effect, highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Go ahead and get this, it's really good.
reviews.reviewText: Guys, I kid you not, this is one of the best face masks I've ever used. The mask fit my face nicely and it was loaded with serum. I rubbed the extra serum on my neck and chest and I left the mask on for about 30 mins. When I took off the sheet, I massaged the remaining serum into my skin and went to sleep. When I woke up the next morning and washed it off, my skin looked AMAZING. My face was bright, toned and clear and my pores were closed. This is my third purchase because I really love it and I'll continue buying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2022
reviews.reviewText: only came with one face mask yet claim to come with 10?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good basic sheet mask
reviews.reviewText: It's a good basic sheet mask. They hydrate your skin but that's about it. I mostly use these when I travel or go on vacations. Instead of doing my whole night time skincare routine, I can just wash my face and put one of these on and go to sleep. It feels really good if you keep these in the fridge for an extra cooling sensation. They do leave a rather sticky residue which I don't like, which is why I leave them on overnight and wash off in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I bought these after moving to a new (much drier) climate and my skin started feeling needy for moisture. These did the trick! Whenever I'm feeling dried out, I just pop one of these on and feel so much better 20 minutes later-- cool, soothing and hydrating. I've tried some other sheet masks which died out like paper mache within 10 minutes due to the low humidity in my home state, but these stay damp for 20 minutes (probably longer, but I never keep them on longer). I think the sheet is made of higher quality material than masks I've tried before and does not allow for much evaporation between the sheet and skin. These appear to be legit Korean masks as most the packaging is in Korean and the masks fit my face a little awkwardly like the masks I bought in Korea-- So, I think they're the real deal! None of that knock off junk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2020
reviews.reviewText: I wasn't all that sure about these masks, but they really make your face moisturized and fresh looking. The only downside is the fit isn't very good, but if you lay down while you mask, they are nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 29, 2019
reviews.reviewText: although the product was very wet when you open the packet, when i put it on my face, its seems to peel off from the sides...maybe thats the difference when they are cheap...cheap for a reason.
